titles.title: To amend the Columbia River Gorge National Scenic Area Act.
To amend the Columbia River Gorge National Scenic Area Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: Includes within the definition of "Indian tribes" for purposes of the Columbia River Gorge National Scenic Area Act the Confederated Tribes of the Grand Ronde Community of Oregon.
